features: [ SCENT. SIZE. PACK ] – This variety pack contains 5 different scents of soaps which include: Cold Front, At Bay, Pine Forest (with Pine Tar), Rocky Coast, and Tobacco Bud. Each pack of scents carries 5 soaps of 6 oz. Unlike other natural soap brands, our body soap bars are 20% larger. You will feel refreshed when you get out of the shower. Keep the soap dry between uses to make it last longer.

[ LOVE ITS SCENT & SMELL. LOVE YOUR HYDE. ] – All these are high-quality & high-performance soap bars that have a different feel, scent, and smell. These bath soap will make you feel fresh and leaves your skin feeling very clean. You'll love its scent, smell, and lather. Leave the shower smelling great and feeling genuinely squeaky clean with this men's bar soap.
[ PACK INCLUDES ] – Cold Front, At Bay, Pine Forest, Rocky Coast, and Tobacco Bud.

[ HANDCRAFTED VIA COLD PROCESS. PARABEN FREE ] – Dr. Jekyll Soap Co. offers high-performance, natural products that are handcrafted via a cold process in the USA using sustainable, non-GMO, and vegan ingredients. Also, our products are phthalate, paraben, sulfate, and cruelty-free. Due to the impact that palm oil harvesting has on deforestation and animal habitats, our products contain sustainably grown, Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil Identity Preserved (RSPO-IP), and Palm Done Right oil.

[ THE DR. IS IN ] – Like our namesake, Dr. Jekyll, we recognize the duality of modern man. As such, we have created products that will daily renew the many versions of you. So, whether you’re in the office, in the field, at home, out on the town, or somewhere in between, know our products are made with you in mind. The pack makes it a perfect gift option for the men in your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased Dr. Jekyll Bar Soap and I have to say, I'm thoroughly impressed with this product. The soap lathers up nicely and has a pleasant, refreshing scent that isn't overpowering. What sets this soap apart is how it leaves my skin feeling clean and moisturized, without any dryness or residue.The ingredients in this soap are all natural, which is a big plus for me. I appreciate that the product is free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances. It's gentle enough for daily use and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.Another thing I love about this soap is its durability. It doesn't dissolve quickly like some other bar soaps I've used, so I know it will last me a while.Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Jekyll Bar Soap. It's a quality product that delivers on its promises. If you're looking for a natural, effective, and long-lasting soap, this one is definitely worth trying out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't care, it is better.
reviews.reviewText: I do not care about originality. Pepsi came after Coke, if you prefer Pepsi, do you care about what came first? Imitator? I give zero...stars.This is better then 'that' brand. It is: bigger!; longer lasting!!; has more variety; better scents in my opnion; cheaper (I think); better grip; not as irritating on sensitive skin; and I don't feel like I am having deodorant, cologne, shampoo/conditioner or accessories crammed down my throat. This is what I need. I don't need the craft beer of soap. I just want the good stuff. This...this is the stuff.Well done Doc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This has zero grit so I’m not sure how it’s exfoliating
reviews.reviewText: Says it’s exfoliating but that’s not my experience, not sure if it needs to have a grit to be exfoliating, the smell is nice, I’m not sure if I would say it’s my favorite scent. It quite powerful on the nose, my whole bathroom smells like the soap so there’s that. Not bad for price, if you’re looking for something that has some sort of grit this soap is not what you want however it is slightly more cost effective than dr Squatch soaps. So if money is the factor that determines which one you go with than this soap could be a viable alternative. As for me I’m going to keep looking for another soap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soap but don't leave inside shower
reviews.reviewText: Great porduct, i have sensitive skin and was told to give it a shot and to my suprise even the strong scents dont cause any irratation issues. A bar typically will last about a half a month to a month depending on how much you lather. Get a soap dish or something that allows the bar to dry out tho or it will disappear quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: I love these, they smell as good as Dr squatch but the soaps are about a 1/4 inch thicker and last alot longer. I'm a customer for life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I like this soap better than the competitor. It's a better size, smells great and lathers nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great feels great, super soft soap though. Takes about 2 weeks one shower a day and the bars about gone. Dr squatch may be more expensive but it’s harder and lasts twice as long… just like the mailman

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scent and lather
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Lathers well and most have great scents. I did not like Bay Rum - strait to the trash (personal preference) but, all the rest are stellar!
